main event: An object was observed in Baltimore, Maryland on 11 May 1957.
interesting points: The object was circular and bright in color., It was observed for a duration of two minutes., The object had a peculiar flight path, making it difficult to evaluate., There was 3/10 cloud cover at the time of observation., No sound was reported during the sighting.
sighted object: a circular and bright object in the sky
witness description: The witness observed the object after being called to attention by someone.
